data: Go to history r/history • LenoreHeart125122 Русский 日本語 हिन्दी Português (Portugal) Română বাংলা Bahasa Melayu ไทย Svenska Deutsch 한국어 Norsk (Bokmål) Español Polski Nederlands In the historical aspect, how are Gaius Marius and Lucius Cornelius Sulla Felix related? I want to know about the relation between these two important people. I know that one was a general and other was a senator but I can't seem to understand why their "relationship" was important or how it affected Ancient Rome's history. Read more Share
